text: The Waterford Steam Electric Station, Unit 3, also known as Waterford 3, is a nuclear power station located on a 3,000-acre (12-kmÂ²) up-river from Hahnville, Louisiana, in St. Charles Parish.Waterford on US Nuclear Power Plants List ==References== ==Other websites== * U.S. Department of Energy web page for Waterford * NRC's web page on Waterford Category:Nuclear power plants Category:Buildings and structures in Louisiana
title: Waterford Nuclear Generating Station
